attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2010-0911

Date: 2010-06-18

Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que l’honorable Suzanne Mireault, juge de la Cour supérieure pour les districts de Saint-François et Bedford dans la province de Québec, avec résidence dans la ville de Sherbrooke ou dans le voisinage immédiat de cette ville, soit nommée juge de la Cour supérieure pour les districts de Saint-François et Bedford, dans la province de Québec, avec résidence à Cowansville ou dans les environs.


The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that the Honourable Suzanne Mireault, a Puisne Judge of the Superior Court for the Districts of Saint-François and Bedford in the Province of Quebec, with residence in the City of Sherbrooke or in the immediate vicinity thereof, be appointed a Puisne Judge of the Superior Court for the districts of Saint-François and Bedford, in the Province of Quebec, with residence at Cowansville or in the immediate vicinity thereof.

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that the Honourable Suzanne Mireault, a Puisne Judge of the Superior Court for the Districts of Saint-François and Bedford in the Province of Quebec, with residence in the City of Sherbrooke or in the immediate vicinity thereof, be appointed a Puisne Judge of the Superior Court for the districts of Saint-François and Bedford, in the Province of Quebec, with residence at Cowansville or in the immediate vicinity thereof.
